TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Associates a well-known object type that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator with a remote endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ServiceType class is used to hold information that is specified on the command line to the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) through the `-types` argument.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The object <xref:System.Type> that is passed to the WSDL generator.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the object <xref:System.Type> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type, string url) cil managed

Docs.param: The object <xref:System.Type> that is passed to the WSDL generator.
The well-known endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the object type that is specified in the `type` parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the URL and <xref:System.Type> of an object that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
Gets the object <xref:System.Type> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
Docs.value: The object <xref:System.Type> that the current was created for.

Docs.summary: Gets the URL of an object <xref:System.Type> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
Docs.value: The URL of an object <xref:System.Type> that the current was created for.
